project_Overview.project_Purpose: To create a digital flashcard application for studying and learning.
project_Overview.product_Scope: A basic flashcard application allowing users to create, view, and manage flashcards.  The scope is limited to core flashcard functionality; features like spaced repetition or user accounts are out of scope for this initial version.

functional_Requirements.title: Create Flashcard
functional_Requirements.description: Allow users to create new flashcards with a front and back side.
acceptance_criteria: User can input text for the front and back of a flashcard.
The system saves the new flashcard.
The new flashcard is displayed in the user's flashcard list.

functional_Requirements.title: View Flashcards
functional_Requirements.description: Allow users to view their created flashcards.
acceptance_criteria: User can see a list of all created flashcards.
Each flashcard displays its front side.
User can reveal the back side of a flashcard.

functional_Requirements.title: Edit Flashcard
functional_Requirements.description: Allow users to edit existing flashcards.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a flashcard to edit.
User can modify the front and back text of the selected flashcard.
The system saves the changes to the flashcard.

functional_Requirements.title: Delete Flashcard
functional_Requirements.description: Allow users to delete existing flashcards.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a flashcard to delete.
The system removes the selected flashcard from the list and database.

non_Functional_Requirements.description: The application should be easy to use and intuitive.
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily create, view, edit, and delete flashcards.

non_Functional_Requirements.description: The application should be responsive and load quickly.
Basic security measures should be in place to protect user data.
acceptance_criteria: Data should be stored securely (if applicable).

user_Interfaces: Web-based user interface or a mobile application interface (Assumption: web-based for simplicity).

assumptions_Made: Assumed a simple web application for ease of development. No user accounts or persistent storage are included in this initial scope. Flashcards will be stored locally in the browser.
Assumed a basic single-page application structure.  Complex features (e.g., multiple decks, searching) are out of scope.
Assumed that the application will be accessed primarily through a web browser.
